verses.text: \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou meanest \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou wouldst \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou wentest \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* Madian? \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* chid \w him|strong="H0413"\w* sharply \w and|strong="H1980"\w* almost offered violence.

\w And|strong="H0669"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w could|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w which|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? \w Is|strong="H4100"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* bunch \w of|strong="H0559"\w* grapes \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* vintages \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w Abiezer|strong="H0044"\w*?

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* Lord hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* bands \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Madian, \w Oreb|strong="H6159"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* Zeb: \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w like|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w had|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*, \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w was|strong="H0430"\w* appeased, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H2088"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* swelled \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* Gedeon \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*: \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w so|strong="H0834"\w* \w weary|strong="H5889"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w could|strong="H0376"\w* not \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H7291"\w* \w them|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* fled.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Soccoth: \w Give|strong="H5414"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w faint|strong="H5889"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* Zebee, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Salmana \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Madian.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Soccoth \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: Peradventure \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w palms|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Zebee \w and|strong="H3027"\w* Salmana \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H3899"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* thou demandest \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w army|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*: \w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* Zebee \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Salmana \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w thresh|strong="H1758"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w briers|strong="H1303"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w going|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* thence, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Phanuel: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H8033"\w*. \w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Soccoth \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0853"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1571"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w*: \w When|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H2088"\w* conqueror \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w destroy|strong="H5422"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w tower|strong="H4026"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* Zebee \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Salmana \w were|strong="H1121"\w* resting \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w*. \w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w troops|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* eastern \w people|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w warriors|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w drew|strong="H8025"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w were|strong="H1121"\w* slain.

\w And|strong="H1870"\w* Gedeon \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* Nobe \w and|strong="H1870"\w* Jegbaa, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* enemies, \w who|strong="H5221"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w secure|strong="H0983"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* suspected no hurt.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* Zebee \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Salmana \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Gedeon \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w host|strong="H4264"\w* being \w put|strong="H5127"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* confusion.
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w returning|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w before|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* sun rising,

\w He|strong="H0853"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Soccoth: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* names \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Soccoth, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w described|strong="H3789"\w* unto \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w seventy-seven|strong="H7657"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Soccoth \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* Zebee \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Salmana, \w concerning|strong="H0413"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* upbraided \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: Peradventure \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Zebee \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Salmana, \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* thou demandest \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w weary|strong="H3286"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* faint.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w briers|strong="H1303"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* tore \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* cut \w in|strong="H0376"\w* pieces \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Soccoth.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* demolished \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Phanuel, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Zebee \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Salmana: \w What|strong="H0834"\w* manner \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* Thabor? \w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3644"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*: \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*. \w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* liveth, \w if|strong="H3863"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* saved \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jether|strong="H3500"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* eldest son: \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w drew|strong="H8025"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H5288"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, being \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* Zebee \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Salmana \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Do thou \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* run \w upon|strong="H6293"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w according|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* age: Gedeon \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* Zebee \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Salmana: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ornaments|strong="H7720"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* bosses, \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w necks|strong="H6677"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* kings \w are|strong="H0834"\w* wont \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* adorned.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Gedeon: \w Rule|strong="H4910"\w* thou \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w delivered|strong="H3467"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Madian.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.
